data.title: Pistons Ownership and Schostak Brothers Form Joint Venture to Redevelop The Palace of Auburn Hills and Surrounding Land
data.meta_description: Detroit Pistons Owner Tom Gores and Livonia, Mich.-based Schostak Brothers & Company today announced the formation of a joint venture to redevelop the Palace of Auburn Hills and its surrounding land.  Schostak Brothers will serve as the lead partner and manage the future mixed-use development, which is expected to include corporate office, research & development and technology companies.  Financial terms were not disclosed.
